General.Name: Bank Woori Saudara Indonesia 1906
General.Description: PT Bank Woori Saudara Indonesia 1906 Tbk provides various commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Indonesia. It also provides current and savings accounts, and time and demand deposits; employee, worker, and franchise loans; micro, small, and medium enterprises loans; and corporate and mortgage loans. The company offers remittance collection/clearing, ATM, credit card and telephone bill payment, bancassurance, bank mediation, international and Internet banking, state revenue, bonds, and electronic data capture services. PT Bank Woori Saudara Indonesia 1906 Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. The company operates as a subsidiary of Woori Bank.

1.Name: Mr. Benny Sudarsono Tan
